com.gotenna.sdk.firmware

Class GTFirmwareAmazonDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gotenna.sdk.firmware.GTFirmwareAmazonDownloader

  • public class GTFirmwareAmazonDownloader
extends java.lang.Object
    Download the latest goTenna firmware file from an Amazon S3 Bucket. Created on 2/26/16

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GTFirmwareAmazonDownloader.AmazonFirmwareBucket
      Indicates which Amazon Bucket the firmware file should be downloaded from.
      static interface  GTFirmwareAmazonDownloader.GTFirmwareAmazonDownloaderListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the latest firmware file is downloaded from the Amazon S3 server.
